landing.headline: Your digital recipe notebook
landing.subline: Save, organize and discover your favorite recipes from across the web - all in one place.
landing.feature1Desc: Search recipes from popular cooking sites like GuteKueche, Chefkoch and more. Find exactly what you're looking for.
landing.feature2Desc: Save recipes in your personal collection. Mark favorites and access them anytime.
landing.feature3Desc: Quickly find the right recipe with filters like Quick, Vegetarian, Comfort Food, Summer and more.
landing.feature4Desc: See at a glance the preparation time and difficulty of each recipe. Plan your meals effortlessly.
landing.feature5Desc: Get inspired with "Cook today?" - quick & easy recipes or your personal favorites.
landing.feature6Desc: Import recipes from different websites or add your own. Everything stored in one place.
landing.ctaSubline: Start for free now and organize your recipes like never before.

descriptions.home: SimplyKeepIt is your digital recipe notebook. Save recipes from across the web, organize them with tags, and plan your cooking ideas.
